problem: The payment for my yearly Acme+ subscription failed and I was charged twice.
solution: Issue a refund for the duplicate charge and verify the subscription status is active. Escalate to billing if issues persist.

problem: I can't log in to the app on my new phone. It keeps saying 'Authentication Error'.
A cabin I booked was not as described. The photos showed a lake view but there was none.
solution: Verified with property owner. Photos were outdated. Issued a partial refund to the customer as per company policy.

problem: My premium Acme+ features are not showing up in my account, even though my payment went through.
As a property owner, I'm having trouble updating my listing's availability calendar.
The 'Book Now' button is greyed out for a cabin that shows as available.
solution: This is a known bug related to caching. Advised user to clear cache or try an incognito window as a workaround. Engineering team is on it.

problem: My credit card was declined but I know it's valid. I tried three times.
The entire website is down and I can't access my bookings.
